text: "All of the Lights" is a song by American hip hop performer Kanye West . The song wasreleased as the fourth single on January 18, 2011..The song has a feature from American rapper Kid cudi And singer Rihanna. Also in the song Fourteen artists lent their voices as background vocals to the song: Alicia Keys, John Legend, The-Dream, Drake, Fergie, Kid Cudi, Elton John, Ryan Leslie, Charlie Wilson, Tony Williams, La Roux, Alvin Fields, Ken Lewis, and Rihanna, who also sang the song's hook and is labeled as a featured artist on the single. == References == Category:2011 songs Category:Kid Cudi Category:Rihanna
title: All of the Lights
